data.title: INTITIES; THE SELECTED SHORT STORIES OF ERIC FRANK RUSSELL
data.meta_description: Framingham, MA: NESFA Press, 2001. First edition, second printing. Hardcover. Item #43066 ISBN: 1886778337 Entities is a collection of Eric Frank Russell's five best novels, including the classics Wasp, Sinister Barrier, and Next of Kin, plus three short stories. Introduction by Jack Chalker. Fine in fine and bright dust jacket.
data.meta_site_name: Robert Gavora Fine and Rare Books
data.text:
Framingham, MA: NESFA Press, 2001. First edition, second printing. Hardcover. Item #43066

ISBN: 1886778337

"Entities is a collection of Eric Frank Russell's five best novels, including the classics Wasp, Sinister Barrier, and Next of Kin," plus three short stories. Introduction by Jack Chalker. Fine in fine and bright dust jacket.
